section.p: Update (posted on 4/20/2020): In compliance with the Governor’s Executive Order, SSCS will remain closed through May 15.

During this closure, at-home instruction will continue and food services will continue to be provided. Another round of educational materials will be distributed this Thursday (4/23/2020) from 9am to 11am in the SSCS traffic cycle. Please reach out to teachers to see if your child will be receiving additional physical resources.

p.a: For more details visit Updated COVID – 19 Information
